onViewSelected(android.view.View).Description: Called when a view is bound to the object of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PresenterSwitcher#select_E@.

ClassDesc: A helper class for showing a hover card view below a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#HorizontalGridView_E@. The hover card is aligned to the starting edge of the selected child view. If there is no space when scrolling to the end, the ending edge of the hover card will be aligned to the ending edge of the parent view, excluding padding.
